meanings.definition: The quality or state of being somewhat pink in color.
meanings.sent1: Her cheeks had a noticeable pinkishness after running around outside.
meanings.sent2: The sunset painted the sky with a beautiful pinkishness.
meanings.sent3: The pinkishness of the cotton candy made it look like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: The pinkishness of the flowers in the garden added a touch of warmth to the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The pinkishness of the baby's blanket made it look extra cozy.
